commands:
$help: lists available commands
$ping: to check if alive
$info <COIN_ID>: to find out details of a coin, (Ex. !price btc, !price xlm, !price eth)
$top <NUMBER>: Displays the top x coins. (Ex. $top 10, $top 5)
$coins <COIN1> <COIN2> <COIN3> <COIN4>: Displays UP TO 4 different coins with their stats. (Ex. $coins bitcoin stellar litecoin cardano)
